meanings.definition: A person who has faith or confidence in something.
meanings.sent1: The believer prayed every night before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: She is a strong believer in the power of positive thinking.
meanings.sent3: The believer was so confident in their team winning, they wore their lucky socks.
meanings.sent4: Her belief in the magic of kindness made her a true believer in spreading joy.
meanings.sent5: The believer's unwavering faith in love guided them through tough times.

meanings.definition: One who accepts something as true or real.
meanings.sent1: As a believer in aliens, he was convinced they existed somewhere in the universe.
meanings.sent2: She is a firm believer in the importance of honesty.
meanings.sent3: The believer accepted the challenge of finding the hidden treasure with excitement.
meanings.sent4: His belief in the power of education made him a true believer in lifelong learning.
meanings.sent5: The believer's acceptance of the unknown made them open to new possibilities.
